attributes.action: Stop the barbaric practice of getting horses to jump fences in horse racing.
attributes.additional_details: There are videos showing the riders clearly wipping the poor horse when you can clearly see it has broken both front legs. This is 100% animal cruelty.
attributes.background: This year's (2019) Grand National, 3 horses were destroyed and several suffered severe cuts when they fell after the jumps. I am petitioning to have all jumps and obsticles banned from all horse racing events.
